about_the_game:
After a night out at the movies Andy and Jeanette are on their way home when something shambles into the road. In an attempt to avoid the thing Andy veers off the road and crashes, losing consciousness. When he awakens he finds that Jeanette is missing and a set of shambling footprints lead off towards a dark and looming mansion in the distance. Grabbing his trusty shotgun Andy prepares to rescue Jeanette from the clutches of evil!

Andy Blast Vs The Forces of Evil is a retro 2D Platformer that takes its design from the old-school Apogee/ID games like Dangerous Dave, Bio-Menace, the original Duke Nukem, and Monster Bash! Traverse through nine levels of intense platforming action while dodging enemies and collecting treasures! But be careful! Andy can only take a single hit before going down! Do you have what it takes to make it to the final confrontation with evil and save Jeanette?

Features:
This DEMO of Andy Blast Vs The Forces of Evil includes three full levels and the first boss battle!
